entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon leapt backward in horror and collided painfully with a luggage trolley.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: He turned from Uncle Vernon to Harry. "So, Potter . . . give us a shout if you need us."

entities.name: moody
entities.description: said Moody, grasping Harry's shoulder for a moment with a gnarled hand.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: said Mrs. Weasley whispered, hugging him again.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: said Ron anxiously, shaking Harry's hand.

entities.name: dursley
entities.description: He turned from Uncle Vernon to Harry. "So, Potter . . . give us a shout if you need us."

relationships.description: Uncle Vernon leapt backward in horror and collided painfully with a luggage trolley.
said Moody, grasping Harry's shoulder for a moment with a gnarled hand.
said Mrs. Weasley whispered, hugging him again.
said Ron anxiously, shaking Harry's hand.
It could not have been plainer that she was thinking of what the neighbors would say if they caught sight of these people marching up the garden path.
